name: Parallax (itch) (PyxelRez)
description:
Parallax is an endless runner with a heavy emphasis on unlocking various characters by collecting coins through this endless runner. Combine quick reactions, rapid keyboard tapping and strategic uses of player skills to achieve the highest score possible.

This game was more of a practice of skill, as Game Dev is slightly new to me.

FEATURES :

- Several unlockable characters

- 3 worlds containing a different environment

- Dash ability

- Progressive difficulty, faster gameplay

- Could be ragey - depending on who you are :D

MUSIC IS BY VLAMBEER - PLACEHOLDER, will be changed.
